#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;


inline int inp()
{
       char c=getchar_unlocked();
       int n=0;
       while(c<'0' || c>'9') c=getchar_unlocked();
       while(c>='0' && c<='9') n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
       return n;
}

int main()
{
    int nCase;
    int left[100007],right[100007];
    //scanf("%d",&nCase);
    nCase=inp();
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int nBubbles,count=0;
       //scanf("%d",&nBubbles);
       nBubbles=inp();
       for(int i=0;i<nBubbles;i++) 
       {
               //scanf("%d %d",&left[i],&right[i]);
               left[i]=inp();
               right[i]=inp();
               for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
               {
                  if((left[i]-left[j])*(right[i]-right[j])<0) count++;
               }
       }
       printf("%d\n",count);
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
